mapper.sql: menu_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu(parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num) values(#{parent_id},#{name},#{url},#{perms},#{type},#{icon},#{order_num})
mapper.select: select from sys_menu limit #{index}, #{size} order by order_num asc
mapper.update: update parent_id = #{parent_id}, sys_menu set name = #{name}, url = #{url}, perms = #{perms}, type = #{type}, icon = #{icon}, order_num = #{order_num} where menu_id = #{menu_id}
mapper.select: SELECT m1.*, m2.name parent_name FROM sys_menu m1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu m2 ON m1.parent_id = m2.menu_id ORDER BY m1.order_num ASC
select from sys_menu where type != 2 order by order_num asc
select from sys_menu where type != 2 and parent_id = 1 order by order_num asc
select from sys_menu where type != 2 and parent_id = #{parent_id} order by order_num asc
SELECT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{user_id}
